verses.verse: ( The Israelites Multiply in Egypt) ( 10 46:7-27 ) וְאֵ֗לֶּה <WH428> wə·’êl·leh These שְׁמוֹת֙ <WH8034> šə·mō·wṯ are the names בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> bə·nê of the sons יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> yiś·rā·’êl of Israel הַבָּאִ֖ים <WH935> hab·bā·’îm who went מִצְרָ֑יְמָה <WH4714> miṣ·rā·yə·māh to Egypt אֵ֣ת <WH854> ’êṯ with יַעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> ya·‘ă·qōḇ Jacob, אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> ’îš each וּבֵית֖וֹ <WH1004> ū·ḇê·ṯōw with his family: בָּֽאוּ׃ <WH935> bā·’ū -
רְאוּבֵ֣ן <WH7205> rə·’ū·ḇên Reuben, שִׁמְע֔וֹן <WH8095> šim·‘ō·wn Simeon, לֵוִ֖י <WH3878> lê·wî Levi, וִיהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> wî·hū·ḏāh and Judah;
יִשָּׂשכָ֥ר <WH3485> yiś·śā·š·ḵār Issachar, זְבוּלֻ֖ן <WH2074> zə·ḇū·lun Zebulun, וּבְנְיָמִֽן׃ <WH1144> ū·ḇə·nə·yå̄·min and Benjamin;
דָּ֥ן <WH1835> dān Dan וְנַפְתָּלִ֖י <WH5321> wə·nap̄·tā·lî and Naphtali; גָּ֥ד <WH1410> gāḏ Gad וְאָשֵֽׁר׃ <WH836> wə·’ā·šêr and Asher.

וַֽיְהִ֗י <WH1961> way·hî numbered כָּל־ <WH3605> kāl- in all נֶ֛פֶשׁ <WH5315> ne·p̄eš The descendants יֹצְאֵ֥י <WH3318> yō·ṣə·’ê ... יֶֽרֶךְ־ <WH3409> ye·reḵ- ... יַעֲקֹ֖ב <WH3290> ya·‘ă·qōḇ of Jacob שִׁבְעִ֣ים <WH7657> šiḇ·‘îm seventy ( MT (see also ); DSS and LXX (see also ) seventy-five) נָ֑פֶשׁ <WH5315> nā·p̄eš ..., וְיוֹסֵ֖ף <WH3130> wə·yō·w·sêp̄ including Joseph, הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> hā·yāh who was בְמִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> ḇə·miṣ·rā·yim already in Egypt.

וַיָּ֤מָת <WH4191> way·yā·māṯ died, יוֹסֵף֙ <WH3130> yō·w·sêp̄ Now Joseph וְכָל־ <WH3605> wə·ḵāl and all אֶחָ֔יו <WH251> ’e·ḥāw his brothers וְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> wə·ḵōl and all הַדּ֥וֹר <WH1755> had·dō·wr generation הַהֽוּא׃ <WH1931> ha·hū that

וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> ū·ḇə·nê but the Israelites יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> yiś·rā·’êl ... פָּר֧וּ <WH6509> pā·rū were fruitful וַֽיִּשְׁרְצ֛וּ <WH8317> way·yiš·rə·ṣū and increased rapidly; וַיִּרְבּ֥וּ <WH7235> way·yir·bū they multiplied וַיַּֽעַצְמ֖וּ <WH6105> way·ya·‘aṣ·mū numerous, בִּמְאֹ֣ד <WH3966> bim·’ōḏ and became exceedingly מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> mə·’ōḏ ... וַתִּמָּלֵ֥א <WH4390> wat·tim·mā·lê was filled with them. הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> hā·’ā·reṣ so that the land אֹתָֽם׃פ <WH854> ’ō·ṯām ...

וַיָּ֥קָם <WH6965> way·yā·qām came to power מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> me·leḵ- king, ( Oppression by a New King) ( 510 7:15-19) חָדָ֖שׁ 2319 Adj-ms ( ḥā·ḏāš) Then a new עַל־ 5921 Prep ( ‘al-) in מִצְרָ֑יִם 4714 N-proper-fs ( miṣ·rā·yim) Egypt. אֲשֶׁ֥ר 834 Pro-r ( ’ă·šer) who לֹֽא־ 3808 Adv-NegPrt ( lō-) did not יָדַ֖ע 3045 V-Qal-Perf-3ms ( yā·ḏa‘) know אֶת־ 853 DirObjM ( ’eṯ-) - יוֹסֵֽף׃ 3130 N-proper-ms ( yō·w·sêp̄) Joseph,

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> way·yō·mer he said אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- to עַמּ֑וֹ <WH5971> ‘am·mōw his people, הִנֵּ֗ה <WH2009> hin·nêh “ Look, ” עַ֚ם <WH5971> ‘am ... בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> bə·nê “ the Israelites יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> yiś·rā·’êl ... רַ֥ב <WH7227> raḇ [have become] too numerous וְעָצ֖וּם <WH6099> wə·‘ā·ṣūm and too powerful מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <WH4480> mim·men·nū for us.

הָ֥בָה <WH3051> hā·ḇāh Come, נִֽתְחַכְּמָ֖ה <WH2449> niṯ·ḥak·kə·māh let us deal shrewdly ל֑וֹ Prep│3ms ( lōw) with them, פֶּן־ 6435 Conj ( pen-) or יִרְבֶּ֗ה 7235 V-Qal-Imperf-3ms ( yir·beh) they will increase even more; וְהָיָ֞ה 1961 Conj-w│V-Qal-ConjPerf-3ms ( wə·hā·yāh) and if כִּֽי־ 3588 Conj ( kî-) ... תִקְרֶ֤אנָה 7122 V-Qal-Imperf-3fp ( ṯiq·re·nāh) breaks out, מִלְחָמָה֙ 4421 N-fs ( mil·ḥā·māh) a war וְנוֹסַ֤ף 3254 Conj-w│V-Nifal-ConjPerf-3ms ( wə·nō·w·sap̄) may join גַּם־ 1571 Conj ( gam-) ... הוּא֙ 1931 Pro-3ms ( hū) they עַל־ 5921 Prep ( ‘al-) ... שֹׂ֣נְאֵ֔ינוּ 8130 V-Qal-Prtcpl-mpc│1cp ( śō·nə·’ê·nū) our enemies, וְנִלְחַם־ 3898 Conj-w│V-Nifal-ConjPerf-3ms ( wə·nil·ḥam-) fight בָּ֖נוּ Prep│1cp ( bā·nū) against us, וְעָלָ֥ה 5927 Conj-w│V-Qal-ConjPerf-3ms ( wə·‘ā·lāh) and leave מִן־ 4480 Prep ( min-) ... הָאָֽרֶץ׃ 776 Art│N-fs ( hā·’ā·reṣ) the country. ”

וַיָּשִׂ֤ימוּ <WH7760> way·yā·śî·mū So [the Egyptians] appointed עָלָיו֙ <WH5921> ‘ā·lāw over שָׂרֵ֣י <WH8269> śā·rê taskmasters מִסִּ֔ים <WH4522> mis·sîm ... לְמַ֥עַן <WH4616> lə·ma·‘an the Israelites to עַנֹּת֖וֹ <WH6031> ‘an·nō·ṯōw oppress them בְּסִבְלֹתָ֑ם <WH5450> bə·siḇ·lō·ṯām with forced labor. וַיִּ֜בֶן <WH1129> way·yi·ḇen As a result, they built עָרֵ֤י <WH5892> ‘ā·rê cities מִסְכְּנוֹת֙ <WH4543> mis·kə·nō·wṯ as store לְפַרְעֹ֔ה <WH6547> lə·p̄ar·‘ōh for Pharaoh אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- -. פִּתֹ֖ם <WH6619> pi·ṯōm Pithom וְאֶת־ <WH853> wə·’eṯ- - רַעַמְסֵֽס׃ <WH7486> ra·‘am·sês and Rameses

וְכַאֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> wə·ḵa·’ă·šer - יְעַנּ֣וּ <WH6031> yə·‘an·nū But the more they were oppressed, אֹת֔וֹ <WH853> ’ō·ṯōw - כֵּ֥ן <WH3651> kên - יִרְבֶּ֖ה <WH7235> yir·beh the more they multiplied וְכֵ֣ן <WH3651> wə·ḵên ... יִפְרֹ֑ץ <WH6555> yip̄·rōṣ and flourished; וַיָּקֻ֕צוּ <WH6973> way·yā·qu·ṣū so the Egyptians came to dread מִפְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> mip·pə·nê ... בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> bə·nê the Israelites יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> yiś·rā·’êl ....

וַיַּעֲבִ֧דוּ <WH5647> way·ya·‘ă·ḇi·ḏū They worked מִצְרַ֛יִם <WH4713> miṣ·ra·yim ... אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> bə·nê the Israelites יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> yiś·rā·’êl ... בְּפָֽרֶךְ׃ <WH6531> bə·p̄ā·reḵ ruthlessly

וַיְמָרְר֨וּ <WH4843> way·mā·rə·rū bitter אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - חַיֵּיהֶ֜ם <WH2416> ḥay·yê·hem and made their lives בַּעֲבֹדָ֣ה <WH5656> ba·‘ă·ḇō·ḏāh labor קָשָׁ֗ה <WH7186> qā·šāh with hard בְּחֹ֙מֶר֙ <WH2563> bə·ḥō·mer and mortar, וּבִלְבֵנִ֔ים <WH3843> ū·ḇil·ḇê·nîm in brick וּבְכָל־ <WH3605> ū·ḇə·ḵāl and with all kinds עֲבֹדָ֖ה <WH5656> ‘ă·ḇō·ḏāh of work בַּשָּׂדֶ֑ה <WH7704> baś·śā·ḏeh in the fields. אֵ֚ת <WH853> ’êṯ - כָּל־ <WH3605> kāl- Every עֲבֹ֣דָתָ֔ם <WH5656> ‘ă·ḇō·ḏā·ṯām service אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> ’ă·šer- - עָבְד֥וּ <WH5647> ‘ā·ḇə·ḏū they imposed בָהֶ֖ם Prep│3mp ( ḇā·hem) בְּפָֽרֶךְ׃ 6531 Prep-b│N-ms ( bə·p̄ā·reḵ) was harsh.

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> way·yō·mer said מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> me·leḵ Then the king מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> miṣ·ra·yim of Egypt לַֽמְיַלְּדֹ֖ת <WH3205> lam·yal·lə·ḏōṯ midwives, הָֽעִבְרִיֹּ֑ת <WH5680> hā·‘iḇ·rî·yōṯ to the Hebrew אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> ’ă·šer whose שֵׁ֤ם <WH8034> šêm names were הָֽאַחַת֙ <WH259> hā·’a·ḥaṯ vvv שִׁפְרָ֔ה <WH8236> šip̄·rāh Shiphrah וְשֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> wə·šêm ... הַשֵּׁנִ֖ית <WH8145> haš·šê·nîṯ and פּוּעָֽה׃ <WH6326> pū·‘āh Puah,

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> way·yō·mer - בְּיַלֶּדְכֶן֙ <WH3205> bə·yal·leḏ·ḵen women give birth, אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - הָֽעִבְרִיּ֔וֹת <WH5680> hā·‘iḇ·rî·yō·wṯ “ When you help the Hebrew וּרְאִיתֶ֖ן <WH7200> ū·rə·’î·ṯen observe [them] עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- on הָאָבְנָ֑יִם <WH70> hā·’ā·ḇə·nā·yim the birthstools. אִם־ <WH518> ’im- If בֵּ֥ן <WH1121> bên is a son, הוּא֙ <WH1931> hū [the child] וַהֲמִתֶּ֣ן <WH4191> wa·hă·mit·ten kill אֹת֔וֹ <WH853> ’ō·ṯōw him; וְאִם־ <WH518> wə·’im- but if בַּ֥ת <WH1323> baṯ a daughter, הִ֖יא <WH1931> hî it is וָחָֽיָה׃ <WH2421> wā·ḥā·yāh let her live. ”

וַתִּירֶ֤אןָ <WH3372> wat·tî·re·nā feared הַֽמְיַלְּדֹת֙ <WH3205> ham·yal·lə·ḏōṯ The midwives, however, אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - הָ֣אֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> hā·’ĕ·lō·hîm God וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> wə·lō and did not עָשׂ֔וּ <WH6213> ‘ā·śū do כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> ka·’ă·šer as דִּבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> dib·ber had instructed אֲלֵיהֶ֖ן <WH413> ’ă·lê·hen ...; מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> me·leḵ the king מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> miṣ·rā·yim of Egypt וַתְּחַיֶּ֖יןָ <WH2421> wat·tə·ḥay·ye·nā live. אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - הַיְלָדִֽים׃ <WH3206> hay·lā·ḏîm they let the boys

וַיִּקְרָ֤א <WH7121> way·yiq·rā summoned מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> me·leḵ- So the king מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH4714> miṣ·ra·yim of Egypt לַֽמְיַלְּדֹ֔ת <WH3205> lam·yal·lə·ḏōṯ the midwives וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> way·yō·mer and asked לָהֶ֔ן Prep│3fp ( lā·hen) them, מַדּ֥וּעַ 4069 Interrog ( mad·dū·a‘) “ Why עֲשִׂיתֶ֖ן 6213 V-Qal-Perf-2fp ( ‘ă·śî·ṯen) have you done הַדָּבָ֣ר 1697 Art│N-ms ( had·dā·ḇār) ... הַזֶּ֑ה 2088 Art│Pro-ms ( haz·zeh) this? וַתְּחַיֶּ֖יןָ 2421 Conj-w│V-Piel-ConsecImperf-2fp ( wat·tə·ḥay·ye·nā) live? ” אֶת־ 853 DirObjM ( ’eṯ-) - הַיְלָדִֽים׃ 3206 Art│N-mp ( hay·lā·ḏîm) Why have you let the boys

וַתֹּאמַ֤רְןָ <WH559> wat·tō·mar·nā answered הַֽמְיַלְּדֹת֙ <WH3205> ham·yal·lə·ḏōṯ The midwives אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- ... פַּרְעֹ֔ה <WH6547> par·‘ōh Pharaoh, כִּ֣י <WH3588> kî for לֹ֧א <WH3808> lō are not כַנָּשִׁ֛ים <WH802> ḵan·nā·šîm women, הַמִּצְרִיֹּ֖ת <WH4713> ham·miṣ·rî·yōṯ like the Egyptian הָֽעִבְרִיֹּ֑ת <WH5680> hā·‘iḇ·rî·yōṯ “ The Hebrew women כִּֽי־ <WH3588> kî- ... חָי֣וֹת <WH2422> ḥā·yō·wṯ are vigorous הֵ֔נָּה <WH2007> hên·nāh they בְּטֶ֨רֶם <WH2962> bə·ṭe·rem before תָּב֧וֹא <WH935> tā·ḇō·w arrives אֲלֵהֶ֛ן <WH413> ’ă·lê·hen .... ” הַמְיַלֶּ֖דֶת <WH3205> ham·yal·le·ḏeṯ and give birth וְיָלָֽדוּ׃ <WH3205> wə·yā·lā·ḏū a midwife

וַיֵּ֥יטֶב <WH3190> way·yê·ṭeḇ was good אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> ’ĕ·lō·hîm So God לַֽמְיַלְּדֹ֑ת <WH3205> lam·yal·lə·ḏōṯ to the midwives, וַיִּ֧רֶב <WH7235> way·yi·reḇ multiplied הָעָ֛ם <WH5971> hā·‘ām and the people וַיַּֽעַצְמ֖וּ <WH6105> way·ya·‘aṣ·mū numerous. מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> mə·’ōḏ and became even more

וַיְהִ֕י <WH1961> way·hî - כִּֽי־ <WH3588> kî- And because יָֽרְא֥וּ <WH3372> yā·rə·’ū feared הַֽמְיַלְּדֹ֖ת <WH3205> ham·yal·lə·ḏōṯ the midwives אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> hā·’ĕ·lō·hîm God, וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <WH6213> way·ya·‘aś He gave לָהֶ֖ם Prep│3mp ( lā·hem) them בָּתִּֽים׃ 1004 N-mp ( bāt·tîm) families of their own.

וַיְצַ֣ו <WH6680> way·ṣaw commanded פַּרְעֹ֔ה <WH6547> par·‘ōh Then Pharaoh לְכָל־ <WH3605> lə·ḵāl all עַמּ֖וֹ <WH5971> ‘am·mōw his people לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> lê·mōr ...: כָּל־ <WH3605> kāl- “ Every הַבֵּ֣ן <WH1121> hab·bên son הַיִּלּ֗וֹד <WH3209> hay·yil·lō·wḏ born [to the Hebrews] ( SP, LXX, and Targum Yonaton; Hebrew does not include to the Hebrews.) הַיְאֹ֙רָה֙ <WH2975> hay·’ō·rāh into the Nile, תַּשְׁלִיכֻ֔הוּ <WH7993> taš·lî·ḵu·hū you must throw וְכָל־ <WH3605> wə·ḵāl but every הַבַּ֖ת <WH1323> hab·baṯ daughter תְּחַיּֽוּן׃ס <WH2421> tə·ḥay·yūn you may allow to live. ”
